answers.answer: You can probably google this if you're just looking for statistics,  but my doctor made judgements like this based on how quickly women heal.  Some women he called "quick healers" and some took longer.If in the past,  your two c-sections healed quickly and without difficulties and you were quickly on your feet and back to normal,  that might be a better judge than statistics on women in their 40's who are relatively healthy.
